content: Why not be more concerned about where the REST of the money is going?? http: //www.dailynewscaster.com/ Billions given to the German, French, British, Swiss and other such banking industries around the world??? Where only $44 Billion tax dollars are actually STAYING in the United States!! That is what we should be outraged about..

title: Why so concerned about AIG paying Bonuses??
